title: New: Beat Connection – The Palace Garden, 4AM
body:
Generic sentence about how gorgeous the weather is.

Generic sentence about how everyone should be outside instead of cramped up in their claustrophobic office spaces. Grossly exaggerated statement regarding the quality of this track, and how disgustingly fitting it is for the current weather. Enjoy.

But seriously, this is probably **Beat Connection’s** best work to date.
